content: Terminate all sessions except the current one

comment.text: "Used in a button within the 'Logout All' dialog to display the label for terminating all sessions except the current one."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'إنهاء جميع الجلسات باستثناء الجلسات الحالية' literally translates to 'End all sessions except the current sessions'. While understandable, it's slightly clunky. A more natural phrasing in Arabic would convey the meaning more smoothly. The word 'sessions' is repeated unnecessarily.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إنهاء جميع الجلسات باستثناء الجلسة الحالية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Cari sessiyadan başqa bütün sessiyaları dayandırın' is a literal translation but could be improved for natural flow. 'Terminate' implies a forceful end, and while 'dayandırın' (stop) is acceptable, a more precise verb might enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cari sessiyadan başqa bütün aktiv sessiyaları pozun

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Прекратете всички сесии освен текущата' while generally conveying the meaning, could be more precise. 'Terminate' implies a forceful ending, which might be too strong. A softer phrasing might be more appropriate depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Прекратете всички сесии, с изключение на текущата (Prekratete vsichki sesii, s izkluchenie na tekuщata)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ukončení všech relací kromě aktuální' while understandable, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Terminate all sessions except the current one'. 'Ukončení' implies a definitive termination, whereas the English implies a more general action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ukončit všechny relace kromě aktuální' or 'Konec všech relací kromě aktuální'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Τερματισμός όλων των περιόδων λειτουργίας εκτός από την τρέχουσα' is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'terminate'. A more natural phrasing in Greek would be something along the lines of 'Διακοπή όλων των συνεδριών εκτός από την τρέχουσα'. 'Συνεδρίες' (Synedries) is a more common term for sessions in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διακοπή όλων των συνεδριών εκτός από την τρέχουσα

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Päätä kaikki paitsi nykyinen istunto' implies 'start' rather than 'terminate'. 'Terminate' is closer to 'lopeta' or 'katkaise'.

The Armenian translation 'Դադարեցնել բոլոր սեանսները, բացի ընթացիկից' translates literally to 'Terminate all sessions, except the current one'. While functionally similar, a more natural and precise translation for 'Terminate all sessions except the current one' in this context might use a phrasing that emphasizes the exclusion of the current session. This could imply the user is still logged in.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like 'Դադարեցնել բոլոր սեանսները, բացառությամբ ընթացիկ սեանսի' which translates to 'Terminate all sessions, excluding the current session'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ດຶບມື້ຍຸ່ງງານທັງໝົດ ທີ່ບໍ່ແມ່ນຊຸດປະຈຸບັນ" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Terminate all sessions except the current one."  "ດຶບມື້ຍຸ່ງງານ" literally translates to "pull/take work", which is not relevant to session termination. "ຊຸດປະຈຸບັນ" means "current set/batch", which isn't the right terminology for a session.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would focus on termination and exclusion of the current session.  Possible alternatives include:  "ຢຸດເຊັດຊຸດທັງໝົດ ນອກຈາກຊຸດປະຈຸບັນ" (Stop all sessions except the current one) or "ລົບຊຸດທັງໝົດ ທີ່ບໍ່ແມ່ນຊຸດປັດຈຸບັນ" (Delete all sessions that are not the current session).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'හැර' (her) is not the most natural way to say 'except' in this context. While technically correct, it sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'හැර' with 'නອກ.'  The sentence would then become: 'වත්මන් සැසිය හැර අනෙකුත් සියළු සැසියන් අවසන් කරන්න.' becomes 'වත්මන් සැසිය හැර අනෙකුත් සියළු සැසියන් අවසන් කරන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ukončenie všetkých relácií okrem aktuálnej' is a literal translation and lacks nuance. 'Terminate' implies a more forceful action than simply ending something. It's a bit stiff and doesn't quite capture the original meaning in a natural Slovak way.

The Serbian translation 'Прекини све сесије осим тренутне' translates literally to 'Terminate all sessions except the current one'. While technically correct, 'Прекини' implies a forceful termination. A more user-friendly and potentially more accurate translation might use a word like 'Затвори' (Close) or 'Укини' (Cancel).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Затвори све сесије осим тренутне' or 'Укини све сесије осим тренутне'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prekini sve sesije osim trenutne' while understandable, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Terminate'. 'Prekini' implies a more forceful or abrupt termination. A more accurate translation might consider 'Završi' or 'Ukinuti'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Završi sve sesije osim trenutne' or 'Ukinuti sve sesije osim trenutne'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Terminate all sessions except the current one" implies a more active and forceful termination than the Ukrainian translation suggests. "Завершити всі сеанси, крім поточного" translates to 'Finish all sessions except the current one', which is less forceful.  A more accurate translation would convey the termination aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation closer to 'Припинити всі сеанси, крім поточного' (Prypynyty vsi sesanyi, kрім поточного) which translates to 'Stop all sessions except the current one'.
